name: Who Let the Frog Out
description:
Who Let the Frog Out is a fun and thrilling arcade game that allows you to immerse yourself in a world of adventure and competition. Are you ready to accept the challenge and help your frog and its friends reach the top? Start your adventure today and find out how far you can go!

Features:
  • Variety of Characters: Start your adventure as a cute frog and unlock numerous other animals such as funny dogs, speedy ducks, agile goats, and even playful pigs. Each character possesses unique characteristics and abilities.
  • Dangerous Traps: The game world is full of hazards. Cross multiple death-defying paths where you'll encounter circular saws, river logs, deadly fireballs, and other traps. Stay vigilant and use your skills to avoid them!
  • Dynamic Gameplay: You'll experience endless forward and sideways movement, requiring precise jumps and evasions. The captivating game mechanics demand quick reflexes and agility.
  • Competitions and Achievements: Strive to score as many points as possible by overcoming new obstacles and collecting coins. Compete with friends, beat your records, and unlock new heroes.
